title: Packaging Module
description: Details about product packaging materials and their properties.

packagingMaterials.description: A list of packaging elements associated with the product.

packagingMaterialType.description: The type of material used for packaging (e.g., Cardboard, Plastic).

packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity.description: The quantity of the material used.

packagingRecyclingProcessType.description: Indicates if the packaging is Recyclable, Reusable, or Compostable.

packagingRecycledContent.description: The percentage of recycled content in the packaging material.

packagingSubstanceOfConcern.description: Indicates if the packaging contains substances of concern.
